meta.name: VBM Preprocessor
meta.description: This computation runs Voxel Based Morphometry on structural T1 weighted MRI scans(BIDS format and T1w nifiti) using SPMv12 standalone and MATLAB Runtimev713. Each scan takes approximately 5 mins to run on a system with 2.3 GHz,i5 equivalent processor, 8GB RAM. Each scan output directory takes about 150MB space. Please make sure to have the space and resources.
